ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Feature-store governance with lineage/access/drift/retention gates and rollback.

bullets.item: RBAC with least privilege and time-bound elevation.
Drift flags with incident response and rollback triggers.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Mandatory lineage recording and schema-change RFCs.
RBAC with break-glass approval and audit trails.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Drift thresholds with rollback and incident playbooks.
